# METAUTO.ai
> Personal research homepage of Mingchen Zhuge, focused on AI agents, coding agents, multi-agent systems, world models, and recursive self-improvement.

## Canonical URLs
- Home: https://metauto.ai/
- Blog: https://metauto.ai/blog/
- Project summaries: https://metauto.ai/projects/
- This file: https://metauto.ai/llms.txt

## Person
- Name: Mingchen Zhuge
- Role: PhD Candidate
- Affiliation: KAUST
- Topics: AI agents, coding agents, multi-agent systems, recursive self-improvement, agent evaluation, multimodal reasoning
